casebody.data:
David JONES, T/A Royal Cleaners and Laundry
v.
TOWN OF ANGIER; and Angier & Black River Fire Department, Inc. No. 80P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 8, 2007. Cathryn M. Little, Raleigh, for Town of Angier. Edgar R. Bain, Lillington, for Jones. Robert W. Sumner, Meredith T. Black, Raleigh, for Angier & Black River Fire Dept. Prior report: ____ N.C.App. ____, 638 S.E.2d 607 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 20th day of February 2007 by Plaintiff (David Jones) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th day of March 2007."
